Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95th buses rrtd EB via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th & Terminal; WB via 95th, Red Line, State, 87th, Halsted & 95th due to blockage nr 95th/ Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a street blockage near 95th/ Eggleston.

  • Eastbound via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th and Red Line Terminal.
  • Westbound via 95th, 95th Red Line, State, 87th, Halsted and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
